name: Peter Dan the Dungeon Man
description: Years and years ago our story begins in a rural town of Chicago, Illinois in 1829 the population was 27 and everyone here had everything they could ever want in life. Although there was one person who stuck out among the rest. The 27th person was the only single person in the town; his name was Peter Dan. He knew something was missing in his life. One day he was walking down the street and saw a bright light coming from a manhole cover. Naturally he went towards it and made sure no one was around to see him. He pulled it aside and a sign popped up next to him reading in old print “The chance of a lifetime awaits”. Without hesitation Peter jumped in to begin his unknown quest. When he woke up he was in what seemed to be an alternate universe.
